<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.15
<SEQUENCE>14
<FILENAME>dex1015.htm
<DESCRIPTION>STOCK AND INCENTIVE AWARD PLAN
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Stock and Incentive Award Plan</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.15 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>BARNES GROUP INC. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>STOCK AND INCENTIVE AWARD PLAN </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as amended on December&nbsp;31, 2008 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Preamble
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Plan as amended on December&nbsp;31, 2008, which is set forth below, is intended to apply to Awards that are granted on or after
that date as well as to Awards that were granted before that date that are outstanding on that date (&#147;Outstanding Awards&#148;), except for Outstanding Awards that were earned and vested (within the meaning of Treasury Regulation section
1.409A-6(a)(2)) on December&nbsp;31, 2004 (&#147;Grandfathered Awards&#148;). Unless a Grandfathered Award is amended to incorporate by reference the terms and conditions of the Plan as amended on December&nbsp;31, 2008, Grandfathered Awards shall
continue on and after that date to be subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan as in effect before December&nbsp;31, 2008, as if the Plan had not been amended on that date. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Plan as amended on December&nbsp;31, 2008 is effective on that date. However, any provision of the Plan as so amended to the contrary
notwithstanding, if any provision of the Plan as so amended would change the time or form of payment of any amount that is payable under the Plan as in effect before that date, such provision shall &#147;apply only to amounts that would not
otherwise be payable in 2008&#148; within the meaning of paragraph .02 of &#167;3 of Notice 2006-79 as modified by Section&nbsp;3.01(B)(1) of Notice 2007-86, and shall be administered, interpreted and construed accordingly. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1. Purposes. </B>The purposes of this Plan are (a)&nbsp;to provide competitive incentives that will enable the Company to attract, retain, motivate and reward persons
who render services that benefit the Company or other enterprises in which the Company has a significant interest, and (b)&nbsp;to align the interests of such persons with the interests of the Company&#146;s shareholders generally. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2. Definitions.</B> Unless otherwise required by the context, the following terms, when used in this Plan, shall have the meanings set forth in this Section&nbsp;2.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) &#147;Allied Enterprise&#148; means a business enterprise, other than the Company or a Subsidiary, in which the Committee determines
the Company has a significant interest, contingent or otherwise. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) &#147;Appreciation-Only Award&#148; means (i)&nbsp;Options and Stock
Appreciation Rights the exercise price of which is equal to at least 100% of Fair Market Value on the date on which the Options or Stock Appreciation Rights are granted, and (ii)&nbsp;Linked Stock Appreciation Rights that are granted as an
alternative to the related Option after the date of grant of such Option, the exercise price of which Stock Appreciation Rights is equal to at least 100% of Fair Market Value on the date on which such Option was granted. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) &#147;Award&#148; means an award granted under this Plan in one of the forms provided for in Section&nbsp;3(a). </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) &#147;Beneficiary&#148; means a person or entity (including but not limited to a trust or estate),
designated in writing by a Service Provider or other rightful holder of an Award, on such forms and in accordance with such terms and conditions as the Committee may prescribe, to whom such Service Provider&#146;s or other rightful holder&#146;s
rights under the Plan shall pass in the event of the death of such Service Provider or other rightful holder. In the event that the person or entity so designated is not living or in existence at the time of the death of the Service Provider or
other rightful holder of the Award, or in the event that no such person or entity has been so designated, the &#147;Beneficiary&#148; shall mean the legal representative of the estate of the Service Provider or other rightful holder, or the person
or entity to whom the Service Provider&#146;s or other rightful holder&#146;s rights with respect to the Award pass by will or the laws of descent and distribution. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) &#147;Board&#148; or &#147;Board of Directors&#148; means the Board of Directors of the Company, as constituted from time to time. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f) &#147;Change in Control&#148; means that any of the following events has occurred: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i)
any Person is or becomes the Beneficial Owner, directly or indirectly, of securities of the Company (not including in the securities beneficially owned by such Person any securities acquired directly from the Company or its Affiliates) representing
25% or more of the combined voting power of the Company&#146;s then outstanding securities, excluding any Person who becomes such a Beneficial Owner in connection with a transaction described in clause (A)&nbsp;of paragraph (iii)&nbsp;below; or
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) the following individuals cease for any reason to constitute a majority of the number of directors serving on the
Board: individuals who, at the beginning of any period of two consecutive years (not including any period prior to the Effective Date), constitute the Board and any new director (other than a director whose initial assumption of office is in
connection with an actual or threatened election contest, including but not limited to a consent solicitation, relating to the election of directors of the Company) whose appointment or election by the Board or nomination for election by the
Company&#146;s shareholders was approved or recommended by a vote of at least two-thirds (2/3)&nbsp;of the directors then still in office who either were directors at the beginning of such period or whose appointment, election or nomination for
election was previously so approved or recommended; or </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) there is consummated a merger or consolidation of the Company
or any Subsidiary with any other corporation, other than (A)&nbsp;a merger or consolidation which would result in the voting securities of the Company outstanding immediately prior to such merger or consolidation continuing to represent (either by
remaining outstanding or by being converted into voting securities of the surviving entity or any parent thereof), in combination with the ownership of any trustee or other fiduciary holding securities under an employee benefit plan of the Company
or any Subsidiary, at least 60% of the combined voting power of the securities of the Company or such surviving entity or any parent thereof outstanding immediately after such merger or consolidation, or (B)&nbsp;a merger or consolidation effected
to implement a recapitalization of the Company (or similar transaction) in which no Person is or </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Page 2 of 29 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">becomes the Beneficial Owner, directly or indirectly, of securities of the Company (not including in the securities beneficially owned by such Person any
securities acquired directly from the Company or its Affiliates) representing 25% or more of the combined voting power of the Company&#146;s then outstanding securities; or </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iv) the shareholders of the Company approve a plan of complete liquidation or dissolution of the Company or there is consummated an
agreement for the sale or disposition by the Company of all or substantially all of the Company&#146;s assets, other than a sale or disposition by the Company of all or substantially all of the Company&#146;s assets to an entity, at least 60% of the
combined voting power of the voting securities of which are owned by shareholders of the Company in substantially the same proportions as their ownership of the Company immediately prior to such sale. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">For purposes of the foregoing provisions of this Section&nbsp;2(f), </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(A) the term &#147;Affiliate&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Rule 12b-2 promulgated under Section&nbsp;12 of the Exchange Act; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(B) the term &#147;Beneficial Owner&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Rule 13d-3 under the Exchange Act; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(C) the term &#147;Person&#148; shall have the meaning given in Section&nbsp;3(a)(9) of the Exchange Act, as modified and used in Sections
13(d) and 14(d) thereof, except that such term shall not include (i)&nbsp;any member of the Barnes family (by blood or marriage) or any entity for the benefit of, or controlled by, a member of the Barnes family (by blood or marriage), (ii)&nbsp;the
Company or any of its subsidiaries, (iii)&nbsp;a trustee or other fiduciary holding securities under an employee benefit plan of the Company or any of its Affiliates, (iv)&nbsp;an underwriter temporarily holding securities pursuant to an offering of
such securities, or (v)&nbsp;a corporation owned, directly or indirectly, by the shareholders of the Company in substantially the same proportions as their ownership of stock of the Company. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(g) &#147;Code&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended and in effect from time to time. References to a particular section of the Code
shall include references to any related Treasury Regulations and to successor provisions of the Code. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(h) &#147;Committee&#148; means the
committee appointed by the Board of Directors to administer the Plan pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;12(a) below. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i)
&#147;Common Stock&#148; means common stock of the Company, par value $.01 per share. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(j) &#147;Company&#148; means Barnes Group Inc., a
Delaware corporation, and, except for purposes of determining under Section&nbsp;2(f) hereof whether or not a Change in Control has occurred, shall include its successors. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(k) &#147;Dividend Equivalents&#148; means a right granted subject to and in accordance with the </FONT>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">provisions of Section&nbsp;5.III. and the other applicable provisions of the Plan (including, without limitation, Section&nbsp;9). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(l) &#147;Dollar-Denominated Awards&#148; means Performance Unit Awards and any other Incentive Award the amount of which is based on a specified amount
of money (other than an amount of money determined by reference to the Fair Market Value of a specified number of shares of Common Stock). Options and Stock Appreciation Rights are not Dollar-Denominated Awards. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(m) &#147;Effective Date&#148; means the first date (if any) on which the shareholders of the Company approve the Plan either (i)&nbsp;at a duly held
stockholders&#146; meeting, or (ii)&nbsp;by the written consent of the holders of a majority of the securities of the Company entitled to vote, in accordance with any applicable provisions of the Delaware General Corporation Law. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(n) &#147;Employee&#148; means any person who is employed by the Company or a Subsidiary on a full-time or part-time basis, including an officer or
director if he is so employed. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(o) &#147;Exchange Act&#148; means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended from time to time.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(p) &#147;Fair Market Value&#148; on a particular date means as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) If the principal market for the Common Stock is a national securities exchange or The NASDAQ Stock Market, the mean between the
highest and lowest sale prices per share of Common Stock in trading on such date as reported by Reuters or another source designated by the Committee; or </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) If the principal market for the Common Stock is not a national securities exchange or The NASDAQ Stock Market, the mean between the highest and lowest sale prices per share of Common Stock in trading on such date
in the over-the-counter market, as reported by the NASDAQ OTC Bulletin Board, the National Quotation Bureau or such other system then providing quotations with regard to trades in the Common Stock or, if on such date the Common Stock is publicly
traded but not quoted by any such system, the mean between the highest bid and lowest asked prices per share of Common Stock on such date as furnished by a professional market maker making a market in the Common Stock; or </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) If in (i)&nbsp;or (ii)&nbsp;above, as applicable, there were no sales on such date reported as provided above, the mean between the
respective prices on the most recent prior day for which sales were so reported. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If the foregoing method of determining fair market value should be
inconsistent with Section&nbsp;422, Section&nbsp;162(m)(4)(C) or any other provision of the Code, then, with respect to Awards (including in particular but not limited to Incentive Stock Options) and transactions that are intended by the Committee
to satisfy Section&nbsp;422, Section&nbsp;162(m)(4)(C) or any other provision of the Code, &#147;Fair Market Value&#148; shall be determined by the Committee in a manner consistent with Section&nbsp;422, Section&nbsp;162(m)(4)(C) or such other
provision of the Code and shall mean the value as so determined. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(q) &#147;General Counsel&#148; means the General Counsel of the Company serving from time to time.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(r) &#147;Incentive Award&#148; means an amount of money that is paid or a number of shares of Common Stock that are issued, or a right to
be paid an amount of money or to be issued a number of shares of Common Stock that is granted, subject to and in accordance with Section&nbsp;5 and the other applicable provisions of the Plan (including, without limitation, Section&nbsp;4 and
Section&nbsp;9). The term &#147;Incentive Award&#148; does not include Options or Stock Appreciation Rights. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(s) &#147;Incentive Stock
Option&#148; means an option, including an Option as the context may require, intended to meet the requirements of Section&nbsp;422 of the Code. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(t) &#147;Linked Stock Appreciation Rights&#148; means Stock Appreciation Rights that are linked to all or any part of an Option, subject to and in accordance with Section&nbsp;8(a), 8(b) and the other applicable provisions of the Plan
(including, without limitation, Section&nbsp;9). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(u) &#147;Non-Statutory Stock Option&#148; means an option, including an Option as the
context may require, which is not intended to be an Incentive Stock Option. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(v) &#147;Option&#148; means an option granted under this Plan
to purchase shares of Common Stock. Options may be Incentive Stock Options or Non-Statutory Stock Options. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(w) &#147;Performance-Based
Compensation&#148; means compensation that satisfies the requirements applicable to &#147;performance-based compensation&#148; under Code Section&nbsp;162(m)(4)(C). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(x) &#147;Performance Share Award&#148; means a right granted subject to and in accordance with Section&nbsp;5 and the other applicable provisions of the Plan (including, without limitation, Section&nbsp;5.II.,
5.II.(d), 6(e) and Section&nbsp;9) to receive a specified number of shares of Common Stock, and/or an amount of money determined by reference to the Fair Market Value of a specified number of shares of Common Stock, at a future time or times if a
specified performance goal is attained and any other terms and conditions set forth in the written instrument documenting the Performance Share Award are satisfied. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(y) &#147;Performance Unit Award&#148; means a right granted subject to and in accordance with Section&nbsp;5 and the other applicable provisions of the Plan (including, without limitation, Section&nbsp;5.II.,
5.II.(d), 6(e) and Section&nbsp;9) to receive a specified amount of money (other than an amount of money determined by reference to the Fair Market Value of a specified number of shares of Common Stock), or shares of Common Stock having a Fair
Market Value equal to such specified amount of money, at a future time or times if a specified performance goal is attained and any other terms and conditions set forth in the written instrument documenting the Performance Unit Award are satisfied.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(z) &#147;Plan&#148; means the Barnes Group Inc. Stock and Incentive Award Plan set forth in these pages, as amended from time to time.

documenting the Restricted Stock Unit Award are satisfied. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ff) &#147;SEC Rule 16b-3&#148; means Rule 16b-3 of the Securities and Exchange
Commission promulgated under the Exchange Act, as such rule or any successor rule may be in effect from time to time. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(gg) &#147;Section
16 Person&#148; means a person subject to potential liability under Section&nbsp;16(b) of the Exchange Act with respect to transactions involving equity securities of the Company. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(hh) &#147;Service Provider&#148; means a person who renders, has rendered or who the Committee expects to render services that benefit or will benefit
the Company or a Subsidiary or an Allied Enterprise, in the capacity of employee, director, independent contractor, agent, advisor, consultant, representative or otherwise, and includes but is not limited to (i)&nbsp;Employees, (ii)&nbsp;personal
service corporations, limited liability companies and similar entities through which any such person renders, has rendered or is expected to render such services, and (iii)&nbsp;members of the Board who are not Employees. </FONT></P> <P

however, that in the case of an Incentive Stock Option, the term &#147;Subsidiary&#148; shall mean a Subsidiary (as defined by the preceding clause) which is also a &#147;subsidiary corporation&#148; as defined in Section&nbsp;424(f) of the Code.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3. Grants of Awards </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) Subject to
the provisions of the Plan, the Committee may at any time, and from time to time, grant the following types of awards to any Service Provider: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) Incentive Awards, which may but need not be in the form of Dividend Equivalents, Performance Share Awards, Performance Unit Awards, Restricted Stock Awards, or Restricted Stock Unit Awards; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) Options; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(iii) Stock Appreciation Rights. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Any provision above of this Section&nbsp;3(a) to the contrary notwithstanding, the Committee may grant Incentive
Stock Options only to Service Providers who are Employees. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) After an Award has been granted, </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) the Committee may waive any term or condition thereof that could have been excluded from such Award when it was granted, and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) with the written consent of the affected participant, may amend any Award after it has been granted to include (or
exclude) any provision which could have been included in (or excluded from) such Award when it was granted unless this Plan indicates when such provision may be included in (or excluded from) such Award, in which case such Award may be amended to
include (or exclude) such provision only when this Plan indicates such provision may be included in (or excluded from) such Award, </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and no additional
consideration need be received by the Company in exchange for such waiver or amendment; provided that, notwithstanding the foregoing, the Committee may not waive any term or condition pursuant to clause (i)&nbsp;above or include (or exclude) any
provision pursuant to clause (ii)&nbsp;above if doing so would &#151; (A)&nbsp;be inconsistent with any other provision of this Plan, or (B)&nbsp;cause an Option or Stock Appreciation Right that the Committee intends when it grants the Option or
Stock Appreciation Right to qualify as an Option or Stock Appreciation Right that &#147;does not provide for a deferral of compensation&#148; within the meaning of Treasury Regulation section 1.409A-1(b)(5)(i)(A) or 1.409A-1(b)(5)(i)(B), to fail to
qualify as such, or (C)&nbsp;constitute an acceleration or deferral of compensation that violates Section&nbsp;409A of the Code, or would otherwise violate Section&nbsp;409A of the Code, or (D)&nbsp;cause an Award that is intended to qualify for an
exclusion from Section&nbsp;409A of the Code to fail to so qualify, or (E)&nbsp;cause an Award which is intended to qualify as performance-based compensation within the meaning of Section&nbsp;162(m) of the Code to fail to qualify as such.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
